debates.showAs: Broadcasting (Oversight of RTÉ Accounts) (Amendment) Bill 2024: Second Stage (Resumed) [Private Members]
Broadcasting (Oversight of RTÉ Accounts) (Amendment) Bill 2024: Second Stage [Private Members]
Broadcasting (Oversight of RTÉ Accounts) (Amendment) Bill 2024: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Broadcasting Act 2009 to give the Comptroller and Auditor General oversight of RTÉ accounts.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú an Achta Craolacháin, 2009 chun formhaoirsiú ar chuntais RTÉ a thabhairt don Ard-Reachtaire Cuntas agus Ciste.
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille Craolacháin (Formhaoirsiú ar Chuntais RTÉ) (Leasú), 2024

debates.showAs: Illegal Israeli Settlements Divestment Bill 2023: Referral to Select Committee [Private Members]
Illegal Israeli Settlements Divestment Bill 2023: Second Stage (Resumed) [Private Members]
Illegal Israeli Settlements Divestment Bill 2023: Second Stage [Private Members]
Illegal Israeli Settlements Divestment Bill 2023: Second Stage (Resumed) [Private Members]
Illegal Israeli Settlements Divestment Bill 2023: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to impose certain prohibitions and restrictions with respect to the investment by the National Treasury Management Agency of the assets of the Ireland Strategic Investment Fund in undertakings which appear on the UN Database of companies operating in illegal Israeli settlements on Palestinian land; to require the Agency to ensure that such assets are not invested in such an undertaking (and, where it becomes aware that an undertaking in which such assets have been so invested by it is, or has been on the said UN database, to divest the assets of that fund from such investment); and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht d’fhorchur toirmisc agus srianta áirithe maidir le Gníomhaireacht Bainistíochta an Chisteáin Náisiúnta d’infheistiú shócmhainní an Chiste Infheistíochta Straitéisí d’Éirinn i ngnóthais atá sa Bhunachar Sonraí de chuid NA de chuideachtaí atá ag oibriú i lonnaíochtaí neamhdhleathacha de chuid Iosrael ar thalamh Palaistíneach; dá cheangal ar an nGníomhaireacht a chinntiú nach ndéanfar na sócmhainní sin a infheistiú i ngnóthas den sórt sin (agus, má thagann sí ar an eolas, maidir le gnóthas ina ndearna sí na sócmhainní sin a infheistiú amhlaidh, go bhfuil sé, nó go raibh sé, sa bhunachar sonraí sin de chuid NA, sócmhainní an chiste sin a dhífheistiú as an infheistíocht sin); agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Dhífheistiú as Lonnaíochtaí Neamhdhleathacha de chuid Iosrael, 2023

debates.showAs: Flood Insurance Bill 2021: Second Stage (Resumed) [Private Members]
Flood Insurance Bill 2021: Second Stage [Private Members]
Flood Insurance Bill 2021: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to provide for fairness in the market for property insurance, and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do dhéanamh socrú maidir le cothroime sa mhargadh le haghaidh árachas maoine, agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.

debates.showAs: Organisation of Working Time (Workers Rights and Bogus Self-Employment) (Amendment) Bill 2019: Leave to Withdraw
Organisation of Working Time (Workers Rights and Bogus Self-Employment) (Amendment) Bill 2019: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Organisation of Working Time Act 1997 to prohibit the practice of designating employment as self-employment; to bring the Garda Síochána, the Defence Forces, and doctors in training, under the protection of the Act; to limit the race to the bottom on workers rights by extending elements of the Act to the self-employed; and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú an Achta um Eagrú Ama Oibre, 1997 chun an cleachtas arb éard é fostaíocht a shainainmniú mar fhéinfhostaíocht a thoirmeasc; do thabhairt an Gharda Síochána, Óglaigh na hÉireann agus ábhar dochtúirí faoi chosaint an Achta; do chur teorainn leis an gclaonadh chun donais i dtaca le cearta oibrithe trí ghnéithe den Acht a leathnú chuig daoine féinfhostaithe; agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleEn: Organisation of Working Time (Workers Rights and Bogus Self-Employment) (Amendment) Bill 2019
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Eagrú Ama Oibre (Cearta Oibrithe agus Féinfhostaíocht Bhréagach) (Leasú), 2019

debates.showAs: Pensionable Age Task Force Bill 2019: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to provide for the establishment of the Pensionable Age Task Force which shall consider and make recommendations on the appropriate level of pensionable age; to provide for the production of a report on the recommendations of the Pensionable Age Task Force; to provide for the dissolution of that Pensionable Age Task Force and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do dhéanamh socrú maidir leis an Tascfhórsa um Aois Inphinsin a bhunú, ar Tascfhórsa é a bhreithneoidh an leibhéal cuí aoise inphinsin agus a dhéanfaidh moltaí ina leith sin; do dhéanamh socrú maidir le tuarascáil a thabhairt ar mholtaí an Tascfhórsa um Aois Inphinsin; do dhéanamh socrú maidir leis an Tascfhórsa um Aois Inphinsin sin a dhíscaoileadh agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille fá Thascfhórsa um Aois Inphinsin, 2019

debates.showAs: Social Welfare Commission Bill 2018: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to provide for the establishment of a commission to make recommendations and report annually on the adequacy of social welfare rates in the state; and to provide for related matters
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do dhéanamh socrú maidir le coimisiún a bhunú chun moltaí a dhéanamh agus chun tuarascáil a thabhairt gach bliain maidir le leordhóthanacht rátaí leasa shóisialaigh sa Stát; agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Choimisiún Leasa Shóisialaigh, 2018

debates.showAs: Social Welfare (Miscellaneous Provisions) (Amendment) Bill 2017: Second Stage (Resumed) [Private Members]
Social Welfare (Miscellaneous Provisions) (Amendment) Bill 2017: Second Stage [Private Members]
Social Welfare (Miscellaneous Provisions) (Amendment) Bill 2017: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to remove certain functions from the Citizens Information Board; to amend the Comhairle Act 2000; and to provide for related matters
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do bhaint feidhmeanna áirithe den Bhord um Fhaisnéis do Shaoránaigh; do leasú an Achta um Chomhairle, 2000; agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara

debates.showAs: Pensions (Amendment) Bill 2017: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Pensions Act 1990 to prevent solvent companies walking away and reneging on their pension obligations to their employees
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú Acht na bPinsean, 1990 chun cosc a chur ar chuideachtaí sócmhainneacha imeacht leo agus loiceadh ar a n-oibleagáidí pinsin i leith a bhfostaithe

Employment Equality (Abolition of Mandatory Retirement Age) Bill 2016: Referral to Select Committee [Private Members]
Employment Equality (Abolition of Mandatory Retirement Age) Bill 2016: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Employment Equality Act 1998 and to provide for related matters
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú an Achta um Chomhionannas Fostaíochta, 1998 agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara
bill.shortTitleEn: Employment Equality (Abolition of Mandatory Retirement Age) Bill 2016
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Chomhionannas Fostaíochta (Aois Scoir Shainordaitheach a Chealú), 2016
